thread.title: Gunman kills 41-year-old man with shot to head in Brooklyn
thread.title_full: Gunman kills 41-year-old man with shot to head in Brooklyn

author: AIDAN MCLAUGHLIN
title: Gunman kills 41-year-old man with shot to head in Brooklyn
text:
8:40 AM 
A gunman shot and killed a 41-year-old man in Brooklyn on Saturday morning, police said. 
The assailant blasted his victim in the head in the basement of a house on Alabama Ave. near Riverdale Ave. in East New York around 4:30 a.m., cops said. 
Officers responding to a 911 call found the man, whose name has not been released, in the basement with a gunshot wound to his head, according to authorities. 
No immediate arrests were made. Join the Conversation:
